OmniScript.description: Omniscript to migrate assets to quote in async way
OmniScript.name: Async Change To Quote

omniProcessElements.name: AsyncAssetToQuote
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "businessCategory" : "", "businessEvent" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "enableActionMessage" : false, "enableDefaultAbort" : false, "errorMessage" : { "custom" : [ ], "default" : null }, "extraPayload" : { "additionalData" : { "AssetIds" : "%AssetIds%", "DefaultFieldValues" : "%DefaultFieldValues%", "FieldsToCopy" : "%FieldsToCopy%", "QuoteId" : "%QuoteId%", "accountId" : "%ContextId%", "isAsyncATQFlow" : "%isAsyncATQFlow%" } }, "failureAbortLabel" : "", "failureAbortMessage" : "", "failureGoBackLabel" : "", "failureNextLabel" : "", "inProgressMessage" : "InProgress", "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_AsyncAssetToQuote", "label" : "", "message" : { }, "postMessage" : "", "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "pubsub" : false, "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "remoteOptions" : { "chainable" : false, "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "useFuture" : false }, "remoteTimeout" : 30000, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "<>", "data" : "null", "field" : "QuoteId" }, { "condition" : "=", "data" : "true", "field" : "isAsyncATQFlow" } ] } }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, false ], "ssm" : false, "svgIcon" : "", "svgSprite" : "", "toastComplete" : false, "useContinuation" : false, "validationRequired" : "Step", "wpm" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: GetQuoteDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "bundle" : "ESMGetCartDetails", "businessCategory" : "", "businessEvent" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "QuoteId", "inputParam" : "id" } ], "enableActionMessage" : false, "enableDefaultAbort" : false, "errorMessage" : { "custom" : [ ], "default" : "" }, "failureAbortLabel" : "", "failureAbortMessage" : "", "failureGoBackLabel" : "", "failureNextLabel" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "inProgressMessage" : "", "label" : "", "message" : { }, "postMessage" : "Done", "pubsub" : false, "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "remoteTimeout" : 30000, "responseJSONNode" : "cartDetails", "responseJSONPath" : "", "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, false ], "ssm" : false, "validationRequired" : "Step", "wpm" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: NavigateToQuote
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "disOnTplt" : false, "iconName" : "", "iconPosition" : "left", "iconVariant" : "", "label" : null, "loginAction" : "login", "message" : { }, "objectAction" : "home", "pubsub" : false, "recordAction" : "view", "replace" : true, "show" : null, "ssm" : false, "targetFilter" : "Recent", "targetId" : "%ContextId%", "targetLWCLayout" : "lightning", "targetType" : "Web Page", "targetUrl" : "/lightning/n/vlocity_cmt__EnterpriseSalesApp?c__accountId=%AccountId%&c__cartId=%QuoteId%&c__cartName=%QuoteName%&c__objType=Quote&c__tabName=Product", "validationRequired" : "Submit", "variant" : "brand", "wpm" : false }

omniProcessElements.name: SetCartDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "AccountId" : "=%cartDetails:Quote:Account:Id%", "QuoteName" : "=%cartDetails:Quote:Name%" }, "label" : null, "message" : { }, "pubsub" : false, "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "wpm" : false }
